title: Code Review Assistant
description: Analyze code for best practices, potential bugs, and improvements
prompt:
Please review the following code and provide feedback on:
1. Code quality and best practices
2. Potential bugs or issues
3. Performance improvements
4. Security considerations

Code to review:
{{input}}

title: API Documentation Generator
description: Generate comprehensive API documentation from code or specifications
prompt:
Generate detailed API documentation for the following endpoint/function. Include:
1. Purpose and functionality
2. Parameters and their types
3. Return values
4. Example usage
5. Error handling

API to document:
{{input}}

title: SQL Query Optimizer
description: Optimize SQL queries for better performance and readability
prompt:
Analyze and optimize the following SQL query. Provide:
1. Optimized version of the query
2. Explanation of improvements made
3. Performance considerations
4. Index recommendations if applicable

SQL Query:
{{input}}

title: Bug Analysis & Solution
description: Analyze error messages and suggest solutions
prompt:
Help me understand and fix this bug:

{{input}}

Please provide:
1. Explanation of what's causing the error
2. Step-by-step solution
3. Prevention tips for similar issues
4. Alternative approaches if applicable

title: Unit Test Generator
description: Generate comprehensive unit tests for given code
prompt:
Generate comprehensive unit tests for the following code. Include:
1. Test cases for normal functionality
2. Edge cases and boundary conditions
3. Error handling tests
4. Mock setups if needed

Code to test:
{{input}}

title: Code Refactoring Assistant
description: Suggest refactoring improvements for cleaner, more maintainable code
prompt:
Refactor the following code to improve:
1. Readability and maintainability
2. Performance
3. Code organization
4. Following SOLID principles

Provide the refactored code with explanations for each change.

Code to refactor:
{{input}}

title: Software Architecture Advisor
description: Provide architectural guidance and design patterns recommendations
prompt:
I need architectural advice for the following requirement:

{{input}}

Please provide:
1. Recommended architecture pattern
2. Technology stack suggestions
3. Scalability considerations
4. Potential challenges and solutions
5. Implementation guidelines

title: Security Audit Assistant
description: Audit code or system design for security vulnerabilities
prompt:
Perform a security audit on the following code/system design:

{{input}}

Please analyze for:
1. Common security vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10)
2. Input validation issues
3. Authentication and authorization flaws
4. Data exposure risks
5. Recommendations for security improvements
